# ==============================================================
# this is a discrete model of the Subaru Telescope pupil using 
# the asymmetric mask described in Martinache (2013, 2016) for
# focal plane based wavefront sensing purposes.
#
# each line contains (x, y) coordinates expressed in meters
# for a discrete pupil element.
#
# this model is used as input by the XARA package to determine
# kernel phases, etc.
# ==============================================================
